scripts.update: pnpm update qqlx-core && pnpm install qqlx-core
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run update && tsc && git add . && git commit -m updates
scripts.patch: npm run commit && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run commit && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.major: npm run commit && npm version major && git push && npm publish
